data.lyric:
[ti:Outside Today (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Until Death Call My Name]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Outside Today (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:13.65]Tryna hide from the cameras I ain't going outside today
[00:16.88]
[00:17.79]Couldn't find Hi-Tec so I'm drinking on Act today
[00:21.09]I'ma pull up in style we gon' do a drive by in the wraith
[00:24.73]I'ma take it to trial pray to Lord I beat the case
[00:28.34]That money be callin' I don't do no talkin'
[00:30.18]So get the f**k outta my face
[00:31.78]Gotta tech and a chopper with a hundred thousand dollars up in the wraith
[00:35.29]You know I ain't slippin' you know that I'm with it
[00:37.50]I'll shoot him right up in his face
[00:39.04]Three say that I'm trippin' you know that I'm drippin'
[00:40.57]I'm wrapped in saran today
[00:42.47]I just bought a brand new watch from God I ain't put it on yet
[00:46.41]I don't care about no b**ch I ain't giving her sh*t
[00:48.06]Spend it all on my homies
[00:49.69]I put on my son from my car to my house everything I own it
[00:53.09]When it come to that money you know I ain't stun I be on it
[00:56.86]I just got a pet monkey cashed out on a tiger
[00:58.68]But really don't want it my son don't like him
[01:00.52]He say that we beefin you know I'll fight em'
[01:02.33]My clip full of thunder you know I'll strike 'em
[01:04.15]Wanna join NBA go and catch you a body
[01:05.83]Free Kevin Gates it's a murder for hire
[01:07.77]Double G gang on the front of my title
[01:09.45]I ran up my Glock and I bought me a rifle
[01:11.43]Tryna hide from the cameras I ain't going outside today
[01:14.88]Couldn't find Hi-Tec so I'm drinking on Act today
[01:18.25]I'ma pull up in style we gon’ do a drive by in the wraith
[01:22.01]I'ma take it to trial pray to Lord I beat the case
[01:25.55]I jump out at your house I ain't shootin' from the corner
[01:27.55]Ben bought me a b**ch but I really don't want her
[01:29.42]I don't do no cappin' I keep it 1hunnit
[01:30.98]Right now I'm recordin' with ten thousand on me
[01:32.60]He say he want smoke but I know he don't want it
[01:34.52]Shoot him and his b**ch and I up one of his homies
[01:36.29]You know how I'm feelin' I don't got to say it
[01:38.28]Face every problem all by my lonely
[01:39.87]Tryna hide from the cameras I ain't going outside today
[01:43.49]Couldn't find Hi-Tec so I'm drinking on Act today
[01:46.91]I'ma pull up in style we gon’ do a drive by in the wraith
[01:50.69]I'ma take it to trial pray to Lord I beat the case
data.trans:
[ti:Outside Today (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Until Death Call My Name]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:13.65]我试着躲避镜头 今天我不会出门的
[00:16.88]
[00:17.79]找不到那件高科技衣服 所以今天我会喝个痛快
[00:21.09]我会酷炫地停下车 我们会如幻影般疾驰而过
[00:24.73]我会把它拿去做个试验 对上帝祈祷 希望我一举成功
[00:28.34]钞票在召唤着我 我不会和你侃侃而谈
[00:30.18]所以 赶快消失在我面前
[00:31.78]我有一架智能直升机 上面装着一摞摞钞票
[00:35.29]你知道 我不会失足 你知道 功名始终与我相随
[00:37.50]我会当着他的面 把他一举击败
[00:39.04]那三个家伙说我遭遇阻碍 你知道我正挥洒汗水
[00:40.57]今天 我就像被保鲜膜包裹一样几欲窒息
[00:42.47]我从上帝那里买了一块新表 但我现在不会戴
[00:46.41]我对女人没兴趣 我才不会理她呢
[00:48.06]我一直都和兄弟们在一起
[00:49.69]我把儿子送回了家 我拥有一切
[00:53.09]说到那笔钱 你知道我并不惊愕 我志在必得
[00:56.86]我有一只宠物猴子 又现金支付买了只老虎
[00:58.68]但我真的不想要了 我儿子不喜欢他
[01:00.52]他说我们还是养着吧 你知道我会跟他们争执不休的
[01:02.33]我的夹子总是发出声响 你知道我会给他们点厉害看看
[01:04.15]想加入NBA 让你捕捉到那威猛的身材
[01:05.83]凯文盖茨还逍遥法外 这是一起雇佣杀人案
[01:07.77]双G帮派抢了我冠军的头衔
[01:09.45]我的格洛克手枪用坏了 我又买了支步枪
[01:11.43]我试着躲避镜头 今天我不会出门的
[01:14.88]找不到那件高科技衣服 所以今天我会喝个痛快
[01:18.25]我会酷炫地停下车 我们会如幻影般疾驰而过
[01:22.01]我会把它拿去做个试验 对上帝祈祷 希望我一举成功
[01:25.55]我从你家跳出去 我不会从角落射击的
[01:27.55]本花钱给我弄来一个小妞 但我真的不想要她
[01:29.42]我绝不会脱帽致意 我始终居高临下
[01:30.98]现在用一万美元打破属于我的记录
[01:32.60]他说想吸烟 但我知道他并非真想那么做
[01:34.52]射杀他和他的女人 我和他的伙计打得火热
[01:36.29]你知道我作何感想 我不想说出来
[01:38.28]每一次遇到问题 我都独挡一面
[01:39.87]我试着躲避镜头 今天我不会出门的
[01:43.49]找不到那件高科技衣服 所以今天我会喝个痛快
[01:46.91]我会酷炫地停下车 我们会如幻影般疾驰而过
[01:50.69]我会把它拿去做个试验 对上帝祈祷 希望我一举成功
